# The `SCEVLoopAddRecRewriter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevloopaddrecrewriter">SCEVLoopAddRecRewriter</a> takes a scalar evolution expression and applies the Map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>) to all AddRecExprs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevloopaddrecrewriter">SCEVLoopAddRecRewriter</a> takes a scalar evolution expression and applies the Map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>) to all AddRecExprs.
